Author: demichka
Text: Hmmm I live in a beach town and usually get very tanned... But still worth a try, right now I'm not going to refuse anything!

Author: Hyper_F0cus
Text: I had significant hair loss due to a vit D deficiency (took FORVER to diagnose) I started taking 1000-5000 IUs per day and my hair grew back normal. Might be worth a try?
